title: Dowsing card
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|The card depicts a blindfolded, chained figure with a forehead tattoo of an eye.}} The Dowsing card can produce three possible effects: [[Magic Mapping]], [[Detect Items]]+[[Detect Traps]], and temporary [[telepathy]]. * Power level 0: the player gets one of the three, selected randomly with equal probabilities. * Power level 1: the player gets one (33%) or two (67%) of the three. * Power level 2: the player gets all three.
